revised_title: A Mathematical Treatise on Conic Sections and Fluxions
tldr: The author presents a mathematical treatise on conic sections and the use of fluxions in solving various mathematical problems. The treatise is divided into three books, covering conic sections, direct method of fluxions, and inverse method of fluxions. The author introduces new principles and methods for solving problems related to maxima, minima, and curve properties.
